resources.string: MyDiary
ข้อมูลการอัพเดท

**0.2.6.170209_1_d_h
 -Fix calendar shadow is not right on some devices
 -Fix left swipe fail on some device

 **0.2.6.170205_1_d
 -Now you can sort the topic list
 -Modify edit and delete function into left swipe
 -Add simple page effect
 -fix bug

 **0.2.5.161018_1_d
 -Add password
 -Fix bug

 **0.2.4.1601010_1_d
 -support French(By Toms) Spanish(By JorgeNava)
 -support sort memo
 -fix night issues
 -fix bug

 **0.2.3.161228_1_h
 -support Thai(By PScoop ,trulesa)

 **0.2.3.161226_1_d
 -Modify get location function for no Google Service area
 -Fix bug

 **0.2.2.161216_1_d2
 -Modify layout for matching movie
 -Using place to replace address in location
 -Fix bug
 -Support Korean(by Meda An)
